name: Sunny Health & Fitness
description: Sunny Health & Fitness is a premier distributor and importer of high-quality health and fitness products, offering a wide array of home gym equipment for both home users and elite fitness professionals.

products.name: SF-T4400 Folding Treadmill
products.description: A foldable treadmill designed for small spaces, featuring a running belt over 4 feet long and 15.5 inches wide, 15-way adjustable incline, pulse readers, Bluetooth connectivity to the SunnyFit app, and a hydraulic bar for soft drop when unfolding.

products.name: SF-RW5515 Magnetic Rowing Machine
products.description: A magnetic rowing machine offering eight levels of resistance, a large LCD console, and a foldable design for easy storage.

products.name: SF-B1002C Chain Drive Indoor Cycling Trainer
products.description: An indoor cycling bike featuring a 49 lb flywheel, adjustable resistance, and a heavy-duty steel frame for stability during intense workouts.

benefits: Wide range of affordable fitness equipment
Space-saving designs suitable for home use
Products cater to various fitness levels and goals
Access to the SunnyFit app with on-demand workouts

customer_reviews.name: John D.
customer_reviews.comment: The SF-T4400 treadmill is perfect for my small apartment. It's sturdy, easy to fold, and offers a great workout.

customer_reviews.name: Emily R.
customer_reviews.comment: I love the SF-RW5515 rowing machine. It's smooth, quiet, and provides a challenging workout.

customer_reviews.name: Michael S.
customer_reviews.comment: The SF-B1002C cycling bike is solid and gives a gym-quality experience at home.

promotions.title: Valentine's Day Deals
promotions.details: Get 5% off on select fitness equipment during our Valentine's Day promotion.

additional_info.warranty: Warranty details vary by product; refer to individual product pages for specific information.
additional_info.return_policy: 30-day money-back guarantee on most products; see website for details.
